plugin.name: ðŸ”¬Reviews
plugin.description: Commands to help review Project-style notes, GTD-style.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark

plugin.commands.name: project lists
plugin.commands.description: creates/updates a human-readable list of project notes, including basic tasks statistics and time until next review, and time until the project is due to complete.

plugin.commands.name: start reviews
plugin.commands.description: start a new series of reviews, deciding which are now ready for review, and kicking off the first one

plugin.commands.name: complete project
plugin.commands.description: add @completed(today) date to the open project

plugin.commands.name: finish project review
plugin.commands.description: updates the current open project's @reviewed() date

plugin.commands.name: next project review
plugin.commands.description: updates this project's @reviewed() date, and jump to next project to review

plugin.commands.name: add project
plugin.commands.description: add a new note representing a project, asking for its metadata
